message.content:
There isn't a single answer to this question as the ideal temperature for sleep can vary from person to person. However, most experts agree that a bedroom temperature between 60-67 degrees Fahrenheit (15-19 degrees Celsius) is optimal for most people.

A cooler room helps your body's natural cooling process while you sleep, which also plays a role in improving the quality of your sleep. If you feel too cold, you can always adjust the thermostat within this range to find what makes you most comfortable.
